title: INSIDE CAROLINA LIVE 3 / 18 / 23 - Up in The Air
body_text:
Tommy Ashley and special guest co-host, Brighton McConnell from 97.9 The Hill WCHL and Chapelboro.com, lead today’s Inside Carolina Live! Joey Powell checks in from the “transfer portal,” and guests include Melvin Scott, Dewey Burke and Matt Krause joins from Columbus to preview UNC women’s basketball opener in the NCAA Tournament. You can watch this week’s episode on YouTube here or listen to the radio broadcast via the player below.
Join InsideCarolina.com‘s Tommy Ashley and Joey Powell for Inside Carolina Live, a 2-hour live sports show taking you behind the scenes with fun commentary, insight from InsideCarolina.com reporters, interviews with former players and more. Inside Carolina Live starts 3 hours before kickoff for every UNC Football Game and airs every Saturday from 10 a.m.-12 p.m. (December-April.) Listen to past shows here.
Chapelboro.com does not charge subscription fees, and you can directly support our efforts in local journalism here. Want more of what you see on Chapelboro? Let us bring free local news and community information to you by signing up for our biweekly newsletter.
